entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
